CustomField.description: Select the type of submission comments that can be entered for this process. For process level comments, only a single comment can be entered. For step level comments, up to three comments can be entered for each step.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the type of submission comments that can be entered for this process. For process level comments, only a single comment can be entered. For step level comments, up to three comments can be entered for each step.
CustomField.label: Submission Comments Type
